title: Team spirit skins awarded for team spirit?
body:
Okay, just before I start, this is only an idea, nothing else! I'd love to hear ideas to improve it though.

So, what if team spirit skins were rewarded for teamwork (team spirit) honours? It'd be a nice reward, and the players would strive to have better teamwork skills because they get more than a label. There could be skins for Teemo {{champion:17}}, Ezreal {{champion:81}}, Anivia {{champion:34}} (a team spirit skin for her is already made but unavailable), and Malzahar {{champion:90}}. (I spelled team in that if nobody noticed)

What do you guys think of this, and should we change the champions?

Thanks for reading :D

replies.body: For stinky players under 20, kurt Cobain approves
The team spirit anivia has nothing to do with 'team spirit" its a legacy skin which was released for the winter olympics im pretty sure. And teemo and ez have more then enough skins.
